Name: Abandon
Tier1: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 0 RA and 0 max WP [+1]
Tier2: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0:  1 RA and 1 max WP -10% armor given and received [+2]
Tier3: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 1 RA and 1 max WP [+3]
Notes: It scales by one every two levels, at level 4 is +2 RA & WP and at level 6 is +3 RA & WP   And It appears that only the Mystical version is available now (update 1.73.1)

Name: About-Turn
Tier2: When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer turns toward them [+2]

Name: Accumulation
Tier1: -20% Heals performed For each turn without performing heals: 5% Heals performed Stackable up to 40% [+1]
Tier2: -20% Heals performed For each turn without performing heals: 10% Heals performed Stackable up to 40% [+2]
Tier3: -20% Heals performed For each turn without performing heals: 15% Heals performed Stackable up to 40% [+3]

Name: Added Value
Tier1: Each time indirect damage is inflicted:  -2% direct damage  2% indirect damage  Up to 40% The bonus is lost at start of turn [+1]
Tier2: Each time indirect damage is inflicted:  -4% direct damage  4% indirect damage  Up to 40% The bonus is lost at start of turn [+2]
Tier3: Each time indirect damage is inflicted:  -6% direct damage  6% indirect damage  Up to 40% The bonus is lost at start of turn [+3]

Name: Allocentrism
Tier1: If the bearer has no Armor: 5% Armor given [+1]
Tier2: If the bearer has no Armor: 10% Armor given [+2]
Tier3: If the bearer has no Armor: 15% Armor given [+3]

Name: Altruism
Tier1: 2% Heals performed on an aligned ally at a distance [+1]
Tier2: 4% Heals performed on an aligned ally at a distance [+2]
Tier3: 6% Heals performed on an aligned ally at a distance [+3]

Name: Ambition
Tier1: At the start of the first turn, if secondary masteries are <= 0: 5% Critical Hit [+1]
Tier2: At the start of the first turn, if secondary masteries are <= 0: 10% Critical Hit [+2]
Tier3: At the start of the first turn, if secondary masteries are <= 0: 15% Critical Hit [+3]

Name: Ambush
Tier1: 2% Damage Inflicted on targets in close combat [+1]
Tier2: 4% Damage Inflicted on targets in close combat [+2]
Tier3: 6% Damage Inflicted on targets in close combat [+3]

Name: AP Return (old Return)
Tier2: Recovers 1 AP on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]
Notes: <- Level 4 lets you recover 2 AP for 2 times per turn.

Name: AP Rupture
Tier2: When the state bearer causes the target to lose Armor:  The state bearer recovers 1 AP [+2]

Name: Arcana
Tier1: If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: 50% of level as Armor [+1]
Tier2: If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: 100% of level as Armor [+2]
Tier3: If the state bearer does not have any armor at end of turn: 150% of level as Armor [+3]

Name: Armor Length
Tier1: 4% Armor given to an aligned ally at a distance [+1]
Tier2: 8% Armor given to an aligned ally at a distance [+2]
Tier3: 12% Armor given to an aligned ally at a distance [+3]

Name: Armor Return
Tier2: Regains 5% of max HP as Armor by killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]

Name: Art Of Concealment
Tier1: -6% Damage received when the bearer is not in line of sight 3% Damage received when the bearer is in line of sight [+1]
Tier2: -12% Damage received when the bearer is not in line of sight 6% Damage received when the bearer is in line of sight [+2]
Tier3: -18% Damage received when the bearer is not in line of sight 9% Damage received when the bearer is in line of sight [+3]

Name: Bashell
Tier1: 6% Damage inflicted on a target with armor [+1]
Tier2: 12% Damage inflicted on a target with armor [+2]
Tier3: 18% Damage inflicted on a target with armor [+3]

Name: Berserk Block
Tier1: When HP are at less than 50%: 5% Block [+1]
Tier2: When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Block [+2]
Tier3: When HP are at less than 50%: 15% Block [+3]

Name: Berserk Critical
Tier1: When HP are at less than 50%: 5% Critical Hit [+1]
Tier2: When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Critical Hit [+2]
Tier3: When HP are at less than 50%: 15% Critical Hit [+3]

Name: Berserk Dodge
Tier1: When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Dodge [+1]
Tier2: When HP are at less than 50%: 20% Dodge [+2]
Tier3: When HP are at less than 50%: 30% Dodge [+3]

Name: Berserk Lock
Tier1: When HP are at less than 50%: 10% Lock [+1]
Tier2: When HP are at less than 50%: 20% Lock [+2]
Tier3: When HP are at less than 50%: 30% Lock [+3]

Name: Berserk Wakfu
Tier1: When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): 3% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) 100% of level as Armor [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): 6% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) 200% of level as Armor [+2]
Tier3: When the state bearer starts their turn with 50% or less of their WP (or their QB): 9% Critical Damage inflicted (1 turn) 300% of level as Armor [+3]

Name: Blocking Expert
Tier2: -50 Elemental Resistance -15% Damage received during a Block  [+2]

Name: Blood Carapace
Tier1: At start of turn: Converts 10% of current HP into Armor [+1]
Tier2: At start of turn: Converts 20% of current HP into Armor [+2]
Tier3: At start of turn: Converts 30% of current HP into Armor [+3]

Name: Blood Stains
Tier1: For each penalty or loss applied to a target:  Blood Stains (+2 Lvl., 1 turn): 2% damage received by the bearer (max 40%) [+1]
Tier2: For each penalty or loss applied to a target:  Blood Stains (+4 Lvl., 1 turn): 4% damage received by the bearer (max 40%) [+2]
Tier3: For each penalty or loss applied to a target:  Blood Stains (+6 Lvl., 1 turn): 6% damage received by the bearer (max 40%) [+3]

Name: Brawling
Tier1: -1 Range 50% of level as Lock and Dodge [+1]
Tier2: -1 Range 100% of level as Lock and Dodge [+2]

Name: Burn
Tier1: 4% damage inflicted in the Fire element [+1]
Tier2: 8% damage inflicted in the Fire element [+2]
Tier3: 12% damage inflicted in the Fire element [+3]

Name: Carapace
Tier1: -2 max AP 75 Elemental Resistance [+1]
Tier2: -1 max AP 75 Elemental Resistance [+2]

Name: Carnage
Tier1: When HP are above 90%: 15% of level in Elemental Mastery [+1]
Tier2: When HP are above 90%: 30% of level in Elemental Mastery [+2]
Tier3: When HP are above 90%: 45% of level in Elemental Mastery [+3]

Name: Clamor  (old Condemnation II)
Tier2: -20 Force of Will Reduces the 1 next MP losses suffered by 1 The effect is reapplied every turn [+2]

Name: Condemnation
Tier2: -20 Force of Will Reduces the 1 next AP losses suffered by 1 The effect is reapplied every turn [+2]

Name: Conservation
Tier1: When HP are above 90%: 10% Block [+1]
Tier2: When HP are above 90%: 20% Block [+2]
Tier3: When HP are above 90%: 30% Block [+3]

Name: Constant Evasion
Tier1: 3% Block [+1]
Tier2: 6% Block [+2]
Tier3: 9% Block [+3]
Notes: Should be renamed to Constant Escape for consistency with the effect

Name: Counterattack
Tier1: When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker (10% of level) [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker (20% of level) [+2]
Tier3: When the state bearer suffers direct close-combat damage, once per turn of the attacker: The state bearer inflicts light damage on the attacker (30% of level) [+3]

Name: Courage
Tier1: 2% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -2% critical damage and heals inflicted [+1]
Tier2: 4% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -4% critical damage and heals inflicted [+2]
Tier3: 6% non-critical damage and heals inflicted -6% critical damage and heals inflicted [+3]

Name: Critical Consolation
Tier1: Each time a non-critical spell is cast:  2% Critical damage inflicted (stackable up to 40)  Bonus is lost on the next critical hit [+1]
Tier2: Each time a non-critical spell is cast:  4% Critical damage inflicted (stackable up to 40)  Bonus is lost on the next critical hit [+2]
Tier3: Each time a non-critical spell is cast:  6% Critical damage inflicted (stackable up to 40)  Bonus is lost on the next critical hit [+3]

Name: Critical Hit Expert
Tier1: At end of turn, if a critical hit was performed:  Heal: 2% of HP lost of the caster [+1]
Tier2: At end of turn, if a critical hit was performed:  Heal: 4% of HP lost of the caster [+2]
Tier3: At end of turn, if a critical hit was performed:  Heal: 6% of HP lost of the caster [+3]

Name: Critical Preparation
Tier1: Each time a critical hit is performed (5 activations per turn): Preparation (+2 Lvl.) [+1]
Tier2: Each time a critical hit is performed (5 activations per turn): Preparation (+4 Lvl.) [+2]
Tier3: Each time a critical hit is performed (5 activations per turn): Preparation (+6 Lvl.) [+3]

Name: Critical Scale
Tier1: Each time a non-critical spell is cast: 2 Critical Hit Bonus is lost on the next critical hit [+1]
Tier2: Each time a non-critical spell is cast: 4 Critical Hit Bonus is lost on the next critical hit [+2]
Tier3: Each time a non-critical spell is cast: 6 Critical Hit Bonus is lost on the next critical hit [+3]

Name: Critical Shield
Tier1: 5 Critical Resistance [+1]
Tier2: 10 Critical Resistance [+2]
Tier3: 15 Critical Resistance [+3]

Name: Cyclical Ruin
Tier2: 20% indirect Damage in even rounds [+2]

Name: Cyclothymia
Tier1: Even turns: 10 Force of Will Odd turns: -10 Force of Will [+1]
Tier2: Even turns: 20 Force of Will Odd turns: -20 Force of Will [+2]

Name: Delay
Tier1: At start of turn, if no WP were used during the previous turn: 4% Damage inflicted 4% Heals performed [+1]
Tier2: At start of turn, if no WP were used during the previous turn: 8% Damage inflicted 8% Heals performed [+2]
Tier3: At start of turn, if no WP were used during the previous turn: 12% Damage inflicted 12% Heals performed [+3]

Name: Destruction
Tier1: 3% Damage from behind -2% frontal and side Damage [+1]
Tier2: 6% Damage from behind -4% frontal and side Damage [+2]
Tier3: 9% Damage from behind -6% frontal and side Damage [+3]

Name: Determination
Tier2: -15% indirect Damage received [+2]

Name: Devastate
Tier1: At start of fight: All Masteries: 5% of level All Resistances: 3  [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight: All Masteries: 10% of level All Resistances: 6  [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight: All Masteries: 15% of level All Resistances: 9  [+3]

Name: Devastation
Tier1: 1 WP -30 Force of Will [+1]
Tier2: 1 WP -20 Force of Will [+2]
Tier3: 1 WP -10 Force of Will [+3]

Name: Dimensionality
Tier2: On the state bearers first turn: 1 WP (non-regenerable) [+2]

Name: Direct Force of Will
Tier1: Outside the bearers turn:  -4 Force of Will During the bearers turn:  3 Force of Will [+1]
Tier2: Outside the bearers turn:  -8 Force of Will During the bearers turn:  6 Force of Will [+2]
Tier3: Outside the bearers turn:  -12 Force of Will During the bearers turn:  9 Force of Will [+3]

Name: Distance Barrier
Tier1: Reduces Ranged Damage suffered by 50% of level, 2 times per turn [+1]
Tier2: Reduces Ranged Damage suffered by 50% of level, 4 times per turn [+2]
Tier3: Reduces Ranged Damage suffered by 50% of level, 6 times per turn [+3]

Name: Distant Ambush (old Ambush II)
Tier1: 4% Damage Inflicted on targets 2 cells away (1 cell between the state bearer and the target) [+1]
Tier2: 8% Damage Inflicted on targets 2 cells away (1 cell between the state bearer and the target) [+2]
Tier3: 12% Damage Inflicted on targets 2 cells away (1 cell between the state bearer and the target) [+3]

Name: Dodge Steal
Tier1: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 15% of level in Dodge (1 turn, not stackable) [+1]
Tier2: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 30% of level in Dodge (1 turn, not stackable) [+2]
Tier3: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 45% of level in Dodge (1 turn, not stackable) [+3]

Name: Earthbound
Tier1: 4% damage inflicted in the Earth element [+1]
Tier2: 8% damage inflicted in the Earth element [+2]
Tier3: 12% damage inflicted in the Earth element [+3]

Name: Embellishment
Tier1: At end of turn, per enemy in close combat: 1% Damage inflicted for the following turn [+1]
Tier2: At end of turn, per enemy in close combat: 2% Damage inflicted for the following turn [+2]
Tier3: At end of turn, per enemy in close combat: 3% Damage inflicted for the following turn [+3]

Name: Endurance
Tier1: -5% to characteristic penalties received. Affects all characteristic penalties (Masteries, Resistances, Armor, Critical Hits, etc.) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+1]
Tier2: -10% to characteristic penalties received. Affects all characteristic penalties (Masteries, Resistances, Armor, Critical Hits, etc.) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+2]
Tier3: -15% to characteristic penalties received. Affects all characteristic penalties (Masteries, Resistances, Armor, Critical Hits, etc.) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+3]
Notes: <- The Encyclopedia says the level I cannot be dropped atm

Name: Escape (old Evasion)
Tier1: At start of fight: 5% Block (1 turn) [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight: 10% Block (1 turn) [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight: 15% Block (1 turn) [+3]

Name: Evasion
Tier1: At start of fight: 50% of level as Dodge [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight: 100% of level as Dodge [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight: 150% of level as Dodge [+3]

Name: Featherweight
Tier1: At the start of combat, per MP above 4: 2% Damage inflicted (maximum 24) [+1]
Tier2: At the start of combat, per MP above 4: 4% Damage inflicted (maximum 24) [+2]
Tier3: At the start of combat, per MP above 4: 6% Damage inflicted (maximum 24) [+3]

Name: Firm Foot
Tier1: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -5% Heals performed to it (1 turn) [+1]
Tier2: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -10% Heals performed to it (1 turn) [+2]
Tier3: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -15% Heals performed to it (1 turn) [+3]

Name: Flaming Return
Tier1: Gains 50% of level as Flaming on killing an enemy (1 activation per turn) [+1]
Tier2: Gains 100% of level as Flaming on killing an enemy (1 activation per turn) [+2]

Name: Flee
Tier2: After dodging (with loss): 1 MP (1 max per turn) [+2]
Notes: Stacks on the limit per turns

Name: Focalization (old Frenzy III)
Tier2: -15% Damage inflicted At start of turn: 25% Damage inflicted if a single enemy was hit the previous turn [+2]

Name: Freezing
Tier1: 4% damage inflicted in the Water element [+1]
Tier2: 8% damage inflicted in the Water element [+2]
Tier3: 12% damage inflicted in the Water element [+3]

Name: Frenzy
Tier2: -20% Damage inflicted At start of turn: 10% Damage inflicted per enemy hit in the previous turn. [+2]

Name: Fury (old Frenzy II)
Tier2: -15% Damage inflicted At start of turn: 5% Damage inflicted per entity hit in the previous turn. [+2]

Name: Healing
Tier1: 5% health points (bonus on HP modifier) [+1]
Tier2: 10% health points (bonus on HP modifier) [+2]
Tier3: 15% health points (bonus on HP modifier) [+3]

Name: Heavy Armor
Tier1: -1 max MP 5% Damage inflicted [+1]
Tier2: -1 max MP 10% Damage inflicted [+2]

Name: Indirect Force of Will
Tier1: Outside the bearers turn:  3 Force of Will During the bearers turn:  -4 Force of Will [+1]
Tier2: Outside the bearers turn:  6 Force of Will During the bearers turn:  -8 Force of Will [+2]
Tier3: Outside the bearers turn:  9 Force of Will During the bearers turn:  -12 Force of Will [+3]

Name: Influence
Tier1: 3% Critical Hit [+1]
Tier2: 6% Critical Hit [+2]
Tier3: 9% Critical Hit  [+3]

Name: Integrity
Tier1: When healing an ally, if the ally has less than 15% HP:  Heal: 7% of HP max of the target [+1]
Tier2: When healing an ally, if the ally has less than 15% HP:  Heal: 15% of HP max of the target [+2]

Name: Interception
Tier1: At start of fight: 50% of level as Lock [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight: 100% of level as Lock [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight: 150% of level as Lock [+3]

Name: Intermediate Vision
Tier1: 3% Damage Inflicted on targets exactly 3 cells away [+1]
Tier2: 6% Damage Inflicted on targets exactly 3 cells away [+2]
Tier3: 9% Damage Inflicted on targets exactly 3 cells away [+3]

Name: Interposition
Tier1: After locking an enemy: 50% of level as Armor [+1]
Tier2: After locking an enemy: 100% of level as Armor [+2]
Tier3: After locking an enemy: 150% of level as Armor [+3]

Name: Last Armor
Tier1: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  5% of max HP as Armor [+1]
Tier2: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  10% of max HP as Armor [+2]
Tier3: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  15% of max HP as Armor [+3]

Name: Last Breath
Tier1: When the bearer starts their turn below 20% HP: 3% Damage inflicted (1 turn) 50% of level as armor [+1]
Tier2: When the bearer starts their turn below 20% HP: 6% Damage inflicted (1 turn) 100% of level as armor [+2]
Tier3: When the bearer starts their turn below 20% HP: 9% Damage inflicted (1 turn) 150% of level as armor [+3]

Name: Last Heal
Tier1: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  Healing: 5% of max HP [+1]
Tier2: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  Healing: 10% of max HP [+2]
Tier3: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  Healing: 15% of max HP [+3]

Name: Last Resistance
Tier1: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  20 Elemental Resistance [+1]
Tier2: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  40 Elemental Resistance [+2]
Tier3: When below 20% of max HP (1 time per fight):  60 Elemental Resistance [+3]

Name: Length
Tier1: 2% Damage Inflicted on aligned targets 2 or more cells away from the state bearer [+1]
Tier2: 4% Damage Inflicted on aligned targets 2 or more cells away from the state bearer [+2]
Tier3: 6% Damage Inflicted on aligned targets 2 or more cells away from the state bearer [+3]

Name: Light Strength
Tier1: As long as the bearer has no Armor: 3% Damage inflicted [+1]
Tier2: As long as the bearer has no Armor: 6% Damage inflicted [+2]
Tier3: As long as the bearer has no Armor: 9% Damage inflicted [+3]

Name: Light Weapons Expert
Tier1: If no other shield, dagger or two-handed weapon is equipped, at start of fight: 25% of level in Elemental Mastery 2% of Damage inflicted on a target with Armor [+1]
Tier2: If no other shield, dagger or two-handed weapon is equipped, at start of fight: 50% of level in Elemental Mastery 4% of Damage inflicted on a target with Armor [+2]
Tier3: If no other shield, dagger or two-handed weapon is equipped, at start of fight: 75% of level in Elemental Mastery 6% of Damage inflicted on a target with Armor [+3]

Name: Lightness
Tier1: After suffering a loss of 3 MP: 10 Force of Will (3 turns) [+1]
Tier2: After suffering a loss of 3 MP: 20 Force of Will (3 turns) [+2]
Tier3: After suffering a loss of 3 MP: 30 Force of Will (3 turns) [+3]

Name: Lock Steal
Tier1: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 15% of level in Lock (1 turn, not stackable) [+1]
Tier2: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 30% of level in Lock (1 turn, not stackable) [+2]
Tier3: -10% Damage inflicted with a weapon When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Steals 45% of level in Lock (1 turn, not stackable) [+3]

Name: Locking
Tier1: 4% Damage inflicted on targets without line of sight 3 or more cells away from the state bearer [+1]
Tier2: 8% Damage inflicted on targets without line of sight 3 or more cells away from the state bearer [+2]
Tier3: 12% Damage inflicted on targets without line of sight 3 or more cells away from the state bearer [+3]

Name: Lone Wolf
Tier1: If there are no allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 2% Damage Inflicted [+1]
Tier2: If there are no allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 4% Damage Inflicted [+2]
Tier3: If there are no allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 6% Damage Inflicted [+3]
ObtainedFrom: Aguabrial @ SorHon, Lord of the Flame  (200) [8%] [2%] [1%]

Name: Madness
Tier1: 6% Damage inflicted in a diagonal line [+1]
Tier2: 12% Damage inflicted in a diagonal line [+2]
Tier3: 18% Damage inflicted in a diagonal line [+3]

Name: Mania
Tier1: Close-combat damage removes 50% of level in Armor from the target -3% Armor received [+1]
Tier2: Close-combat damage removes 100% of level in Armor from the target -6% Armor received [+2]
Tier3: Close-combat damage removes 150% of level in Armor from the target -9% Armor received [+3]

Name: Melee Barrier (old Close-Combat Barrier)
Tier1: Reduces Melee Damage suffered by 50% of level, 2 times per turn [+1]
Tier2: Reduces Melee Damage suffered by 50% of level, 4 times per turn [+2]
Tier3: Reduces Melee Damage suffered by 50% of level, 6 times per turn [+3]

Name: Moon Scales
Tier1: 3% Armor received [+1]
Tier2: 6% Armor received [+2]
Tier3: 9% Armor received [+3]

Name: MP Return (old Return II)
Tier2: Recovers 1 MP on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]
Notes: <- Level 4 lets you recover 2 MP for 2 times per turn.

Name: Nature
Tier1: 2% Heals performed on an ally adjacent to another ally [+1]
Tier2: 4% Heals performed on an ally adjacent to another ally [+2]
Tier3: 6% Heals performed on an ally adjacent to another ally [+3]

Name: Neutrality
Tier1: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 8% damage inflicted [+1]
Tier2: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 16% damage inflicted [+2]
Tier3: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 24% damage inflicted [+3]

Name: Obstinacy (old Resolute II)
Tier1: After suffering a loss of 2 AP: 5 Force of Will (3 turns) [+1]
Tier2: After suffering a loss of 2 AP: 10 Force of Will (3 turns) [+2]

Name: Offensive Block
Tier1: When performing a block on a direct enemy attack: 2% damage inflicted (1 turn) -10% Block (1 turn) [+1]
Tier2: When performing a block on a direct enemy attack: 4% damage inflicted (1 turn) -10% Block (1 turn) [+2]

Name: Paradoxical Influence
Tier1: If a non-critical hit is performed with an elemental spell: 5% Critical Hit on the following turn [+1]
Tier2: If a non-critical hit is performed with an elemental spell: 10% Critical Hit on the following turn [+2]
Tier3: If a non-critical hit is performed with an elemental spell: 15% Critical Hit on the following turn [+3]

Name: Persistence (old Tenacity II)
Tier2: At end of turn, if the state bearer has 6 or more AP: 60 Elemental Resistance (2 turns) [+2]

Name: Poise (old Lightness II)
Tier1: After suffering a loss of 2 MP: 5 Force of Will (3 turns) [+1]
Tier2: After suffering a loss of 2 MP: 10 Force of Will (3 turns) [+2]

Name: Poisoned Weapon
Tier1: -20 Damage inflicted with a Weapon. When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Incurable (level: AP cost of the weapon) on the enemy and state bearer [+1]
Tier2: -15 Damage inflicted with a Weapon. When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Incurable (level: AP cost of the weapon) on the enemy and state bearer [+2]
Tier3: -10 Damage inflicted with a Weapon. When inflicting damage on an enemy with a two-handed weapon: Incurable (level: AP cost of the weapon) on the enemy and state bearer [+3]

Name: Precaution
Tier1: When ending turn with less than 50% HP: Heals 5% of missing HP [+1]
Tier2: When ending turn with less than 50% HP: Heals 10% of missing HP [+2]
Tier3: When ending turn with less than 50% HP: Heals 15% of missing HP [+3]

Name: Pretension
Tier1: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 5% Block [+1]
Tier2: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 10% Block [+2]
Tier3: At the start of the fight, if secondary masteries are ≤ 0: 15% Block [+3]

Name: Profit
Tier2: Regains 1 AP by removing 1 AP or MP from an enemy (1 max per turn) [+2]
Notes: It scales on max usage per turn

Name: Propagation
Tier1: When the state bearer inflicts direct damage, once per turn: Inflicts 10% of level as Light damage on enemies aligned with the target [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer inflicts direct damage, once per turn: Inflicts 20% of level as Light damage on enemies aligned with the target [+2]
Tier3: When the state bearer inflicts direct damage, once per turn: Inflicts 30% of level as Light damage on enemies aligned with the target [+3]

Name: Prosperity (old Endurance II)
Tier1: 3% to characteristic bonuses received. Affects all characteristic bonuses (Masteries, Resistances, Armor) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+1]
Tier2: 6% to characteristic bonuses received. Affects all characteristic bonuses (Masteries, Resistances, Armor) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+2]
Tier3: 9% to characteristic bonuses received. Affects all characteristic bonuses (Masteries, Resistances, Armor) received in combat and cast by an entity other than the state bearer. The value is always rounded down. [+3]

Name: Raw Power
Tier1: At start of fight: -1 max WP For each WP spent during the turn: 2% damage inflicted (1 turn) (max 30) [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight: -2 max WP For each WP spent during the turn: 4% damage inflicted (1 turn) (max 30) [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight: -3 max WP For each WP spent during the turn: 6% damage inflicted (1 turn) (max 30) [+3]

Name: Rear Shield
Tier1: 5 Rear Resistance [+1]
Tier2: 10 Rear Resistance [+2]
Tier3: 15 Rear Resistance [+3]

Name: Recklessness
Tier1: When the bearer removes all of a targets armor: 3% damage inflicted for the rest of the turn 30% maximum [+1]
Tier2: When the bearer removes all of a targets armor: 6% damage inflicted for the rest of the turn 30% maximum [+2]
Tier3: When the bearer removes all of a targets armor: 9% damage inflicted for the rest of the turn 30% maximum [+3]

Name: Reinvigoration
Tier1: -10% Heals Performed 4% of Heals Performed on allies are given back to the state bearer [+1]
Tier2: -10% Heals Performed 8% of Heals Performed on allies are given back to the state bearer [+2]
Tier3: -10% Heals Performed 12% of Heals Performed on allies are given back to the state bearer [+3]

Name: Reprisal
Tier1: When the state bearer suffers ranged direct damage: Inflicts 6% extra damage on the attacker 1 turn, not stackable [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer suffers ranged direct damage: Inflicts 12% extra damage on the attacker 1 turn, not stackable [+2]
Tier3: When the state bearer suffers ranged direct damage: Inflicts 18% extra damage on the attacker 1 turn, not stackable [+3]

Name: Resolute
Tier1: After suffering a loss of 3 AP: 10 Force of Will (3 turns) [+1]
Tier2: After suffering a loss of 3 AP: 20 Force of Will (3 turns) [+2]
Tier3: After suffering a loss of 3 AP: 30 Force of Will (3 turns) [+3]

Name: Rocky Envelope
Tier1: 3% Armor given [+1]
Tier2: 6% Armor given [+2]
Tier3: 9% Armor given [+3]

Name: Ruin
Tier1: 5% indirect Damage [+1]
Tier2: 10% indirect Damage [+2]
Tier3: 15% indirect Damage [+3]

Name: Save
Tier2: At end of turn: Unused AP are carried over to the next turn Max 1 AP [+2]
Notes: <- Level 4 lets you save up to 2 AP, level 6 up to 3 AP.

Name: Scrupulosity
Tier1: 2% Damage Inflicted on targets 5 cells or further away [+1]
Tier2: 4% Damage Inflicted on targets 5 cells or further away [+2]
Tier3: 6% Damage Inflicted on targets 5 cells or further away [+3]

Name: Secondary Burn
Tier1: On casting a Water, Earth, or Air spell:  2% damage inflicted in the Fire element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Fire damage [+1]
Tier2: On casting a Water, Earth, or Air spell:  4% damage inflicted in the Fire element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Fire damage [+2]
Tier3: On casting a Water, Earth, or Air spell:  6% damage inflicted in the Fire element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Fire damage [+3]

Name: Secondary Devastation (old Devastate II)
Tier2: At start of fight: 3% Critical Hit, 3% Block, 3 Force of Will [+2]

Name: Secondary Earthbound
Tier1: On casting a Fire, Water or Air spell:  2% damage inflicted in the Earth element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Earth damage [+1]
Tier2: On casting a Fire, Water or Air spell:  4% damage inflicted in the Earth element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Earth damage [+2]
Tier3: On casting a Fire, Water or Air spell:  6% damage inflicted in the Earth element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Earth damage [+3]

Name: Secondary Freezing
Tier1: On casting a Fire, Earth, or Air spell:  2% damage inflicted in the Water element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Water damage [+1]
Tier2: On casting a Fire, Earth, or Air spell:  4% damage inflicted in the Water element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Water damage [+2]
Tier3: On casting a Fire, Earth, or Air spell:  6% damage inflicted in the Water element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Water damage [+3]

Name: Secondary Ventilation
Tier1: On casting a Fire, Water or Earth spell:  2% damage inflicted in the Air element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Air damage [+1]
Tier2: On casting a Fire, Water or Earth spell:  4% damage inflicted in the Air element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Air damage [+2]
Tier3: On casting a Fire, Water or Earth spell:  6% damage inflicted in the Air element   Stackable up to 30  Effect is consumed on next direct Air damage [+3]

Name: Secret Of Life
Tier2: At start of fight: Reduces Healing Mastery to +0. 10% Heals performed [+2]

Name: Sensitivity
Tier1: If there are two or more allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 2% Damage Inflicted [+1]
Tier2: If there are two or more allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 4% Damage Inflicted [+2]
Tier3: If there are two or more allies 1 to 4 cells from the bearer: 6% Damage Inflicted [+3]

Name: Shell
Tier1: When the state bearer applies Armor on an ally, applies Shell (Lvl 1): The state bearer inflicts Light damage on the attacker (5% of level). The Counter state is removed [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer applies Armor on an ally, applies Shell (Lvl 2): The state bearer inflicts Light damage on the attacker (10% of level). The Counter state is removed [+2]
Tier3: When the state bearer applies Armor on an ally, applies Shell (Lvl 3): The state bearer inflicts Light damage on the attacker (15% of level). The Counter state is removed [+3]
Notes: I think its not available ingame yet?

Name: Slow Escape (old Slow Evasion) (old Evasion II)
Tier2: 3% Blocks per turn (max 40) [+2]

Name: Slow Influence (old Influence II)
Tier1: 1% Critical Hits per turn (max 30) [+1]
Tier2: 2% Critical Hits per turn (max 30) [+2]
Tier3: 3% Critical Hits per turn (max 30) [+3]

Name: Social Relations
Tier1: 2% Damage from behind on even turns 2% frontal Damage on odd turns [+1]
Tier2: 4% Damage from behind on even turns 4% frontal Damage on odd turns [+2]
Tier3: 6% Damage from behind on even turns 6% frontal Damage on odd turns [+3]

Name: Solid Weapon
Tier1: When inflicting damage on an enemy with a weapon: That enemy reduces their damage on the state bearer by -5% (1 turn, not stackable) The state bearer must have a shield equipped [+1]
Tier2: When inflicting damage on an enemy with a weapon: That enemy reduces their damage on the state bearer by -10% (1 turn, not stackable) The state bearer must have a shield equipped [+2]

Name: Solidity
Tier2: Reduces direct damage received greater than 20% of max HP by 400% of level (once per round) [+2]

Name: Spines
Tier1: Performing a Block gives Preparation (+1 Lvl.) [+1]
Tier2: Performing a Block gives Preparation (+2 Lvl.) [+2]
Tier3: Performing a Block gives Preparation (+3 Lvl.) [+3]

Name: Strong Hand
Tier1: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -5% Armor received to it (1 turn) [+1]
Tier2: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -10% Armor received to it (1 turn) [+2]
Tier3: Ending a turn adjacent to an enemy applies -15% Armor received to it (1 turn) [+3]

Name: Stupefaction
Tier1: At start of fight: 5% Critical Hit (1 turn) 5% of level as Critical Mastery (1 turn) [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight: 10% Critical Hit (1 turn) 10% of level as Critical Mastery (1 turn) [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight: 15% Critical Hit (1 turn) 15% of level as Critical Mastery (1 turn) [+3]

Name: Swiftness
Tier1: 1 MP -20% Damage inflicted [+1]
Tier2: 1 MP -10% Damage inflicted [+2]
Notes: <- One linked version of the level II can also be obtained from the Pandalucia level 186 quest.

Name: Tactical Critical
Tier1: 3% critical damage inflicted if the target has > 50% HP -3% critical damage inflicted if the target has ≤ 50% HP [+1]
Tier2: 6% critical damage inflicted if the target has > 50% HP -6% critical damage inflicted if the target has ≤ 50% HP [+2]
Tier3: 9% critical damage inflicted if the target has > 50% HP -9% critical damage inflicted if the target has ≤ 50% HP [+3]

Name: Technical Critical
Tier1: The first critical hit in the turn inflicts 6% addititional damage The following ones inflict 3% less damage [+1]
Tier2: The first critical hit in the turn inflicts 12% addititional damage The following ones inflict 6% less damage [+2]

Name: Tenacity
Tier2: At end of turn, if the state bearer has 2 or more AP: 25 Elemental Resistance (1 turn) [+2]

Name: Theory Of Matter
Tier1: 50% Critical Hit -50% Damage and Heals [+1]
Tier2: 100% Critical Hit -50% Damage and Heals [+2]

Name: Tolerance
Tier1: At end of turn: 50% of unused MP are carried over to the next turn Max 1 MP [+1]
Tier2: At end of turn: 50% of unused MP are carried over to the next turn Max 2 MP [+2]

Name: Topology
Tier1: At the start of combat: All of the state bearers Dodge is converted into Armor at a ratio of 1 for 1. Converted Dodge is lost. [+1]
Tier2: At the start of combat: All of the state bearers Dodge is converted into Armor at a ratio of 1 for 2. Converted Dodge is lost. [+2]
Tier3: At the start of combat: All of the state bearers Dodge is converted into Armor at a ratio of 1 for 3. Converted Dodge is lost. [+3]

Name: Vampiric Madness
Tier1: -4% Heals received When the bearer inflicts damage in a diagonal line: Steals 4% of damage inflicted [+1]
Tier2: -8% Heals received When the bearer inflicts damage in a diagonal line: Steals 8% of damage inflicted [+2]
Tier3: -12% Heals received When the bearer inflicts damage in a diagonal line: Steals 12% of damage inflicted [+3]

Name: Ventilation
Tier1: 4% damage inflicted in the Air element [+1]
Tier2: 8% damage inflicted in the Air element [+2]
Tier3: 12% damage inflicted in the Air element [+3]

Name: Violent Rupture
Tier1: When the state bearer causes the target to lose Armor:  The state bearer inflicts light damage on the target (10% of level) [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer causes the target to lose Armor:  The state bearer inflicts light damage on the target (20% of level) [+2]

Name: Visibility
Tier1: 1 Range -300 Lock -300 Dodge [+1]
Tier2: 1 Range -150 Lock -150 Dodge [+2]

Name: Vital Agility
Tier2: At start of turn, if HP are above 90%: 1 MP [+2]

Name: Vital Influence
Tier1: When HP are above 90%: 4% Critical Hit [+1]
Tier2: When HP are above 90%: 8% Critical Hit [+2]
Tier3: When HP are above 90%: 12% Critical Hit [+3]

Name: Vital Return
Tier1: Heal: 10% of HP lost of the caster   on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+1]
Tier2: Heal: 20% of HP lost of the caster   on killing an enemy (2 activations per turn) [+2]

Name: Vital Strength
Tier2: At start of turn, if HP are above 90%: 1 AP [+2]

Name: Vitality Well
Tier1: Increases Health Steals performed by 5% [+1]
Tier2: Increases Health Steals performed by 10% [+2]
Tier3: Increases Health Steals performed by 15% [+3]

Name: Vivacity
Tier1: 1 AP -150 Elemental Resistance [+1]
Tier2: 1 AP -75 Elemental Resistance [+2]
Notes: <- One linked version of the level II can also be obtained from the Pandalucia level 186 quest.

Name: Wakfu Conservation
Tier2: 1 max WP  At end of turn, if the bearer has not spent any WP:  +1 WP [+2]

Name: Wakfu Influence
Tier1: When the state bearer starts their turn with all their WP (or all their QB): 10% Critical Hit (1 turn) [+1]
Tier2: When the state bearer starts their turn with all their WP (or all their QB): 20% Critical Hit (1 turn) [+2]

Name: Wall
Tier1: At start of fight, 150% of level as Armor [+1]
Tier2: At start of fight, 300% of level as Armor [+2]
Tier3: At start of fight, 450% of level as Armor [+3]
